description: This small village is located just to the south of the city of Bath in Somerset. This walk from the village takes you to the neighbouring village of Monkton Combe before visiting the historic Dundas Aqueduct. The Scheduled Ancient Monument carries the Kennet and Avon Canal over the River Avon and is one of the area's major highlights. The walk uses a section of the Limestone Link, a long distance trail which can be used to further explore the area. Please scroll down for the full list of walks near and around Southstoke. The detailed maps below also show a range of footpaths, bridleways and cycle paths in the area.
display_address: Old School Hill, Midford, Southstoke, Bath and North East Somerset, West of England, England, BA2 7DU, United Kingdom
